column4: I'm running Zoneminder (linux security camera platform) on an Intrepid 8.1 PC (xubuntu)
with two NIC cards. I have 6 "IP" security cameras, which i placed
on their own network (10.0.1.x) with its own router.
The "Front Of House" connection lives on a 192.168.1.x network
Please don't flood, use http://paste.ubuntu.com to paste, don't use Enter as punctuation.
